methods.name: vision
title: Google
Cloud#vision
methods.description: Creates a new object for connecting to the Vision service. Each call creates a new connection.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud"

gcloud = Google::Cloud.new
vision = gcloud.vision

image = vision.image "path/to/landmark.jpg"

landmark = image.landmark
landmark.description #=> "Mount Rushmore"

examples.caption: The default scope can be overridden with the scope option:
examples.code:
require "google/cloud"

gcloud  = Google::Cloud.new
platform_scope = "https://www.googleapis.com/auth/cloud-platform"
vision = gcloud.vision scope: platform_scope

params.name: scope
params.description:
The OAuth 2.0 scopes controlling the set of resources and operations that the connection can access. See Using OAuth 2.0 to Access Google APIs.

The default scope is:

  • https://www.googleapis.com/auth/cloud-platform

params.name: retries
params.description: Number of times to retry requests on server error. The default value is 3. Optional.

params.name: timeout
params.description: Default timeout to use in requests. Optional.

methods.name: vision
title: Google
Cloud.vision
methods.description: Creates a new object for connecting to the Vision service. Each call creates a new connection.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/vision"

gcloud = Google::Cloud.new
vision = gcloud.vision

image = vision.image "path/to/landmark.jpg"

landmark = image.landmark
landmark.description #=> "Mount Rushmore"

params.name: project
params.description:
Project identifier for the Vision service you are
connecting to.

params.name: keyfile
params.description:
Keyfile downloaded from Google Cloud. If
file path the file must be readable.

params.name: scope
params.description:
The OAuth 2.0 scopes controlling the set of resources and operations that the connection can access. See Using OAuth 2.0 to Access Google APIs.

The default scope is:

  • https://www.googleapis.com/auth/cloud-platform

params.name: retries
params.description: Number of times to retry requests on server error. The default value is 3. Optional.

params.name: timeout
params.description: Default timeout to use in requests. Optional.
